message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, $110 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
